subject: Mental Health
title: The DSM: Defining Mental Illness
description: A micro-lesson that makes The DSM: Defining Mental Illness usable.

hook.text: How do you decide if someone is mentally ill? A committee writes the rulebook.

buildup.text: The DSM was first published in 1952 with 106 diagnoses.

discovery.text: By DSM-5 in 2013, the number had grown to nearly 300 recognized disorders.
